page.title: 08A WEEKEND.
page.content: On a Saturday I laze around all day. Most people like weekends because they can relax after a hard_working week.Some people like to sit in their favourite chair all day watching sport on the Television. Others like to concentrate on thier hobbies, like gardening, cooking or sport.On a Sunday some like to go to a Church or Chaple service.Also on a Sunday some people have a "Sunday Dinner" which is meat,potatoes,vegtables,Yorkshire Puddings and gravy.On a Saturday morning there are cartoons or interesting things on woodwork or sewing on the television for children then most of the rest of the day is sport.On a Sunday it is all sport until about 5.30p.m.then there are drama programme and series.The village Newsagents is open from 6a.m.till 6p.m. on a Saturday,8am to 12.30pm Sun
